Term.Name: Assignment 1 - Best Bird Site
Term.Notes: Finish the BestBird site started in class. Error trap the inputs. Clear the form when appropriate. Due: October 27, 2014

Term.Name: Assignment 2 - PetShop
Term.Notes: Create an inventory list system (based on Assignment #1) that will cover all of the birds, mammals, reptiles, and fish at a pet store. Inventory items can be added, deleted and sorted by quantity, species, and type. Due: November 18, 2014

Term.Name: Assignment 3 - Edge Animate Title
Term.Notes: Create an Edge Animate title for Assignment #2. Due: November 17, 2014

Term.Name: Assignment 4 - ActionScript + Flash
Term.Notes: Correct the error and provide a date readout for Scene 2 in the Time Between Times calculator. Due: Nov. 25, 2014

Term.Name: Assignment 5 - PHP Livesearch
Term.Notes: Change the livesearch html/php pages so that they display infomation about three programming terms. Due: Nov. 25, 2014

Term.Name: Assignment 6 - PHP Livesearch
Term.Notes: Create an index page for your IT 426 website that makes use of the technologies presented in class.

Term.Name: Final - PHP Livesearch
Term.Notes: Livesearch of Terms with example code pages
